remarks: The group element order is either zero or a nonzero multiplier that annihilates the element.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
odval.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odval.2 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
odval.3 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
odval.4 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odval.i $e |- I = { y e. NN | ( y .x. A ) = .0. } $.
odlem1 $p |- ( A e. X -> ( ( ( O ` A ) = 0 /\ I = (/) ) \/ ( O ` A ) e. I ) ) $.
$d .0. y $.
$d .x. y $.
$d A y $.
$d G y $.
